value.verse: Rejoice with Jerusalem and be glad for her *

value.halfverse: all you who mourn over her,

value.verse: That you may drink deeply with delight *

value.halfverse:
“I will extend peace to her like a river,
the wealth of nations like an overflowing stream.
and you shall nestle in her lap.
value.verse: “You shall nurse and be carried on her arm, *
“As a mother comforts her child, so will I comfort you; *
value.halfverse: you shall be comforted in Jerusalem.
you shall flourish like the grass of the fields.”
value.verse: “You shall see, and your heart shall rejoice, *

metadata.localname: A Song of Jerusalem Our Mother
